question: 800 Rs. at 5% per annum compounded annually will amount to 882 Rs. in :
explanation:
$latex A = P\\left ( 1+\\frac{R}{100} \\right )^{T}&s=1$
$latex => 882 = 800\\left ( 1+\\frac{5}{100} \\right )^{T}&s=1$
$latex => \\frac{882}{800} = \\left ( \\frac{21}{20} \\right )^{T}&s=1$
$latex => \\frac{441}{400} = \\left ( \\frac{21}{20} \\right )^{2}= \\left ( \\frac{21}{20} \\right )^{T}&s=1$
âˆ´ T = 2 years
Hence option [B] is correct answer.
